data.title: Katy Perry and Russell Brand's marriage was doomed with big warning sign
data.meta_description: The former couple had given indicators that they would not be happily married for long as a friend of the actor revealed following their split
data.text:
Russell Brand and Katy Perry's marriage was doomed from the start after a telling confession from one of his friends.

Fellow comedian David Baddiel was with Russell on the day of the nuptials and has previously revealed how he told him he had a huge row with Katy the night before the wedding. David - who previously co-hosted Russell's BBC Radio 2 show with him as a guest presenter - opened up about the situation to Glamour on their Hey It’s Okay podcast, and admitted he often wondered if he should have intervened.

David told the outlet in 2017: "Can I say that I was at Katy Perry’s first wedding? I was there... Russell did tell me that they had a big row the night before they got married. I did think when he said that, of asking, 'Are you sure?' but I didn’t say that. Perhaps I should have done."

The former couple said "I do" at a breathtaking wedding ceremony with scenic views in India back in October 2010. Brand and Perry, who met at the VMAs in 2008, became an item in September 2009 and got engaged after three months of dating. Getting down on one knee, Russell proposed to his pop singer girlfriend near the Taj Mahal in India on New Year's Eve.

At their intimate and private wedding ceremony the loved-up pair, and their guests, wore traditional Indian clothes. Taking place near a wildlife sanctuary, the ex-couple's nuptials featured an array of animals from camels, to elephants, and horses. The actor and singer also had famous guests at the wedding – including P Diddy, David Walliams, and Jonathan Ross.

However, only 14 months into their marriage, Russell broke up with Katy over a text message. It was alleged Russell, who was aged 36 at the time, was struggling with Katy’s superstar fame. Their divorce was finalised in 2012.

Opening up about the breakdown of their marriage in 2013, Katy told Vogue: "He's a very smart man, and I was in love with him when I married him. Let's just say I haven't heard from him since he texted me saying he was divorcing me December 31, 2011." Meanwhile, Russell blamed her pop career for the split, saying "I'm associated with the very thing I detest: vapid vacuous, plastic, constructed, mindless celebrity."
